content.rendered:
COVID-19 has been really challenging for small businesses. This is why Clio wants to offer 25% off all new services to businesses who have been affected by the pandemic. Read this story for more information.

We are faced with unprecedented times in history. The COVID-19 pandemic has resulted in countless lost lives and crippling economical strain. Small businesses have been severely affected by the pandemic due to closures and loss of income. We understand that this is a very tough time for small businesses.

Helping small businesses is the reason why we got into this industry in the first place. This is why Clio Websites is now offering the following COVID-19 supports for small businesses:

  1. 25% off all new services for businesses affected by the pandemic
  2. Deferral of Website Monthly Maintenance Plans (for up to 3 months)
  3. Free Website Evaluation for new clients

25% Discount on new services

We know how important promoting your business and getting new leads is for small businesses. In fact, having a website is critical in order for your customers to take your business seriously. This is why we are now offering a 25% discount on all new services for businesses who have been affected by the COVID pandemic. If you want to find out more please contact us.

Monthly maintenance plan payment deferral

Keeping your websites up to date is very important. Not only does it ensure that your websites will continue to run smoothly, but it also ensures that the customer information that you are storing is protected. We will allow all of our new and existing clients to defer website maintenance payments for up to 3 months if they have been adversely affected by COVID-19. Please contact us to find out more.

Free website evaluation

We are also offering free website evaluations that every business owner can take advantage of. This free, no obligation, website evaluation will assess website performance, security, design, and SEO. The free evaluation provides recommendations that will help you focus your efforts and make the biggest impact on your visitors and leads. Visit our free evaluation page and complete the form in order to get a free evaluation.

Contact Clio Websites if you require any of these supports or have any questions. Stay healthy and safe and we will get through this together!
